thread.title: BRIEF-Chrysaor Announces Start Of New Drilling Campaign In Partnership With Baker Hughes

title: BRIEF-Chrysaor Announces Start Of New Drilling Campaign In Partnership With Baker Hughes

organizations.name: brief-chrysaor announces start of new drilling camp

text:
April 27, 2018 / 9:31 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Chrysaor Announces Start Of New Drilling Campaign In Partnership With Baker Hughes Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 27 (Reuters) - CHRYSAOR -
* CHRYSAOR - ANNOUNCES START OF NEW DRILLING CAMPAIGN IN UK PORTFOLIOM NEW SERVICE PARTNERSHIP CONTRACT WITH BAKER HUGHES
* CHRYSAOR - CHRYSAOR AS OPERATOR AND BHGE AS SERVICE PARTNER WILL SHARE IN RISKS AND REWARDS ASSOCIATED WITH BOTH THE OPERATION AND RESERVOIR OUTCOMES Further company coverage:
